title: After sanction of development permission, the authority shall make available all plans relating to such permission on its web-site, if available
clause_text: After sanction of development permission, the authority shall make available all plans relating to such permission on its web-site, if available. Such documents shall be kept on web-site till one month from the date of issuance of last occupation certificate.
section: Display of Sanctioned Permissions on Authority's Web-Site

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
